head.supplied: Melbourne Botanic Garden, ¶ 10 August 1872. ¶ ¶ You have perhaps not been aware, that the short ¶ Journal of a missionary voyage to New Guinea ¶ , by Murray and McFarlane, ¶ was published in London...

div.p: Sammlung Perthes Archiv, SPA ARCH PGM 328 , Forschungsbibliothek Gotha der Universität Erfurt.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: MS annotation by Petermann: 'Erh. 29. Sept. 1872' [Received 29 September 1872]. For a published version of this letter, see Voigt (1996), p. 111. Melbourne im bot Garten,

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;

div.p: Vielleicht ist es Ihnen nicht bekannt geworden, dass in London bei John Snow & Co, 2 Ivy Lane, in diesem Jahr das kurze "Journal of a missionary voyage to New Guinea" by Murray & McFarlane erschien. Ich habe nur eine Copie, u. daher werden Sie lieber das kleine Buch direct beziehen wollen.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: end;

div.p:
You have perhaps not been aware, that the short Journal of a missionary voyage to New Guinea, by Murray and McFarlane,
A. Murray & McFarlane (1872). was published in London by John Snow & Co., 2 Ivy Lane. I have only one copy, so you had better obtain the small book from there directly.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
font-family: Geneva, Geneva; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in; font-size: 10pt;
